properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM 40 FOOT S/V RAISON D'ETRE,
WHITE AND BLUE HULL, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
IN 13-17.41N 052-11.45W AT 280358Z JAN. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO U.S. COAST GUARD
RCC MIAMI, PHONE: 305 415 6800.
